def Load(widget): objeto = widget.ProviderWidget if (objeto == None) : return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes")
from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoObjeto
widget.Hidden = CNContratoObjeto.PrevisaoEntregaMostrarTab(objeto.Entity.Handle)
contratoEmElaboracao = objeto.Entity.ContratoEmElaboracao(objeto.Entity.ContratoHandle) if widget.View.Commands["CMD_GERARENTREGAS"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_GERARENTREGAS"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["CMD_EXCLUIRTODAS"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_EXCLUIRTODAS"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao if widget.View.Commands["New"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = contratoEmElaboracao

def OnCMD_EXCLUIRTODASExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_CONTRATOOBJETOS")) command.TransitoryVars.Add("HANDLECONTRATO", item.Handle)

def InitializeRow(entity, row): objeto = entity.ObjetoInstance contratoEmElaboracao = objeto.ContratoEmElaboracao(objeto.ContratoHandle) if row.EditCommand <> None: row.EditCommand.Visible = contratoEmElaboracao if row.DeleteCommand <> None: row.DeleteCommand.Visible = contratoEmElaboracao
